title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 27.6 - Cover page
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 27.6 - Cover page

State Regulations

The cover page shall contain at least the following
information: the date of the official statement; the total principal amount of
the obligations; the name of the issuer; the type of obligations being offered
(e.g.,serial bonds, tax anticipation notes, etc.); the date of issue; the
maturity date or dates, including a statement as to whether the obligations are
redeemable prior to maturity; interest payment dates; the place or places of
payment; the denominations of the obligations if known; a statement as to the
tax status of interest on the obligations; and the place and proposed date for
delivery of the obligations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
27.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
